title: Syria appoints Maysaa Sabrine as first female governor of its central bank
description:
(AP photo)

Syria's new leadership has appointed Maysaa Sabrine , the former deputy governor of the Syrian central bank, as its new governor. Sabrine, who has spent years overseeing the war-torn country's banking sector, becomes the first woman to lead the institution in its 70-year history, accordi...

title: Iraq’s Prime Minister, U.S. envoy discuss support for Syria’s stability
description:
Baghdad, Dec . 01 (SANA) Iraq’s Prime Minister Mohammed Shia’ al-Sudani discussed with Special Envoy for Syria Tom Barrack on Sunday practical mechanisms for Iraq to continue supporting Syria’s stability, security, and economic recovery

title: Iraqi PM, US Syria envoy discuss regional stability
description:
Iraqi PM, US Syria envoy discuss regional stability

Baghdad, Dec 1 (UNI) Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia' al-Sudani held discussions with US Special Envoy for Syria Tom Barrack on the regional stability and efforts to prevent further escalation.

title: EU eases Syria sanctions to help revive economy
description:
The European Union on Monday began easing energy and transport sanctions and banking restrictions against Syria, aiming to help breathe life into the conflict-torn country’s economy if its new leaders work toward a peaceful future.

title: Syria News: Israel says it will close Dublin embassy, citing 'extreme anti-Israel policies'
description:
23:13 (IST) Dec 14

Bars and pubs in Damascus are cautiously reopening after the fall of Bashar al-Assad’s government, despite initial fears of an alcohol ban by the new ruling group, Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS). The Islamist group took control of the city after a 13-year civil war, prompting concern...
